name: Horse Riding Competition 3D: My Summer Derby Games
name_original: Horse Riding Competition 3D: My Summer Derby Games
description:
Best free game of horses racing at the summer games 2016!
--DOWNLOAD THIS FUNNY GAME FOR FREE AND WIN THE RACE DERBY WITH YOUR HORSE--

THE BEST HORSE RACING GAME
Having played many games on the market, we have developed what we consider our ideal horse racing game, set in the 2016 summer games. We are passionate about horse racing and riding, so we have created what we consider the best horses races game.

REALISTIC GRAPHICS
In this game we have worked with realistic 3D horses graphics for the competition derby in the 2016 summer games as real as possible. Horses have realistic features and volume, so you can play dodging other horses in this race full of emotion and fun.

GUARANTEED FUN
A free fun game, to enjoy and entertain when you need it most. In addition you can play all you want completely free to make your racing horse a champion at the 2016 summer games.

3D SCENARIOS
We have prepared for you 3D scenes in the hippodrome, for realistic horse racing in the 2016 summer games. Opponents horses in this race are very realistic, as well as the riders or jokeys and the racecourse in this game for fans of equestrian and horses races.

Download this free game now to win the 2016 gold medal with your horse at the hippodrome!
